name: Pomelo vs. the Universe
description:
Pomelo vs. the Universe Story

Thousands upon thousands of years have passed since the robogirl Pomelo embarked on her journey across the cosmos to retrieve a magical artifact to help humanity avoid certain doom. Can she make it there alive?

Controls
  • Movement - Arrow Keys
  • Shooting - Z
  • Bombing - X
  • Focus / Slow Movement - Left Shift
  • Pause / Fun - Escape
Credits

Made in partership by me and AxolotlHime for the "Major Jam: Cosmic."

All art and programming done by us.
